# About
This is a repository which tests usage of GitHub **Actions**, to create 
binary for Windows as well as for MacOS (Intel) of a simple Python GUI :

![Draw GUI](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/3399107/420901935-f1e17fa8-5f84-4a61-ad37-0366bde57e0e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..EjecdCgE2ncURPbQW3r6LQR23LBekiAhfpV_w5etyXQ)

The goal of this Python program is to show the user how many times we will get a success out of 60 draws. Each run, of course, may return a different, random number of chances.
